title: Wikipedia Research
snippet:
## Wikipedia Results for: "openai chatgpt atlas browser release windows history"

### ChatGPT Atlas
ChatGPT Atlas (also known as simply Atlas) is an AI browser developed by OpenAI. It is based on Chromium and is currently only available on macOS. On October 21, 2025, OpenAI announced ChatGPT Atlas and released it for macOS. The announcement stated that versions for Windows, iOS, and Android were coming soon.
